attributes.action: I wish to submit written evidence to The House of Commons, Petition Committee
attributes.additional_details:
To submit written evidence to the government in the UK, find the specific select committee's inquiry on the UK Parliament website and submit your evidence through their online portal by the given deadline. Keep your evidence short, focused, & clearly written in plain English, using section headings and numbered paragraphs. Include factual information from your own knowledge or research and offer clear arguments or recommendations for action.

Inquiry to be called "The Usage of committee powers"
attributes.background:
My written evidence & knowledge that I obtained  is held here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxAJNxpbJFO6lQHvwH3g3wA in my community posts.
It is not currently published.

I need to access it so I can compile the written evidence from it.
Please compel YouTube UK to produce the articles to me

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the videos published on YouTube are a matter for YouTube, not the UK Government or Parliament.
